message: Let's start with a fair offer. I take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate more in the next rounds.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split for this round. Let's be reasonable - time is money, and it's losing value fast for both of us!
Let's try to find a compromise. I'm willing to reduce my share to 60% this time. We're both losing money with each round, so we need to work together.
Alice, we're running out of time!  This offer is my bottom line.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation working against us both.
